plot: The lord of the manor has fallen madly in love with one of his subjects, but the latter spurns his advances, and under pretense of a misdemeanor she is apprehended and taken into custody. ...
title: Amore d'altri tempi
plot_es: The lord of the manor has fallen madly in love with one of his subjects, but the latter spurns his advances, and under pretense of a misdemeanor she is apprehended and taken into custody. ...
plot_en: The lord of the manor has fallen madly in love with one of his subjects, but the latter spurns his advances, and under pretense of a misdemeanor she is apprehended and taken into custody. ...
